name: Aina

skills.name: Ferocity
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Has a 10% chance of granting an Extra Turn.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5

skills.name: Bloody Swath
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 80% chance of placing a 25% [Weaken] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10'

skills.name: Overmaster
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Before attacking, has an 80% chance of placing a 60% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns. Heals this Champion by 10% of the damage inflicted.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10
